item.title: Seymour Cray profile
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: This 80’s three part piece on Seymour Cray is pretty ace - especially the Lou Reed R.A.D. (Rock Against Drugs!) and Greenpeace ad’s at about 11m12s in!
